name: Well Equiped Hero
description:
PLEASE LEAVE FEEDBACK AND A RATING IF YOU ENJOYED THE GAME

PLEASE LET ME KNOW OF ANY ISSUES YOU FIND

Trapped in a dungeon deep underground, you must use your array of gear to escape. Save yourself first, then worry about whether or not you could have helped others survive.

How To Play:

Navigate the dungeon to escape (keep moving up / right). Along the way you can use keys to unlock doors to find shortcuts, attack enemies with a sword, or use your magic boots to double jump. If you die you'll respawn near where you died.

Once you've beat the game, you'll be given the option to go back and give some of your gear to other prisoners - making yourself weaker and your escape harder.

Items:

  • Armour: 3 health instead of 1
  • Sword: Lets you attack enemies
  • Boots: Allow your to jump in the air
  • Keys (x3): Open short cuts allowing you to skip tricky areas
  • Ring of Resurrection - Allows you to respawn nearby (and not at the start)

Controls:

  • A/D, Left Arrow / Right Arrow - Left / Right
  • W, Up Arrow - Jump / Double Jump
  • Left Click - Attack
  • Mouse - Control Camera
  • E - Give away an item or take it back
  • Esc - Go back to the item giving room from the dungeon to change what items you've given up
